Description:
Adversaries may abuse PowerShell commands and scripts for execution.
PowerShell is a powerful interactive command-line interface and scripting environment included in the Windows operating system


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Remote Session Creation
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (scriptblocktext like '%new-pssession%' and scriptblocktext like '%-computername %')
